    • 方法详细资料

      • statusCode

        int statusCode()
        Get current response http status code. e.g: 200
        返回:
        return response status code

      • status

        Response status(int status)
        Setting Response Status
        参数:
        status - status code
        返回:
        Return Response

      • badRequest

        default Response badRequest()
        Set current response http code 400
        返回:
        Setting Response Status is BadRequest and Return Response

      • unauthorized

        default Response unauthorized()
        Set current response http code 401
        返回:
        Setting Response Status is unauthorized and Return Response

      • notFound

        default Response notFound()
        Set current response http code 404
        返回:
        Setting Response Status is notFound and Return Response

      • contentType

        Response contentType(String contentType)
        Setting Response ContentType
        参数:
        contentType - content type
        返回:
        Return Response

      • contentType

        String contentType()
        Get current response headers: contentType
        返回:
        return response content-type

      • headers

        Map<String,String> headers()
        Get current response headers
        返回:
        return response headers

      • header

        Response header(String name,
                String value)
        Set current response header
        参数:
        name - Header Name
        value - Header Value
        返回:
        Return Response

      • cookies

        Map<String,String> cookies()
        Get current response cookies
        返回:
        return response cookies

      • cookiesRaw

        Set<io.netty.handler.codec.http.cookie.Cookie> cookiesRaw()

      • cookie

        Response cookie(Cookie cookie)
        add raw response cookie

        cookie -
        返回:
        return Response instance

      • cookie

        Response cookie(String name,
                String value)
        Add Cookie
        参数:
        name - Cookie Name
        value - Cookie Value
        返回:

      • cookie

        Response cookie(String name,
                String value,
                int maxAge)
        Setting Cookie
        参数:
        name - Cookie Name
        value - Cookie Value
        maxAge - Period of validity
        返回:
        Return Response

      • cookie

        Response cookie(String name,
                String value,
                int maxAge,
                boolean secured)
        Setting Cookie
        参数:
        name - Cookie Name
        value - Cookie Value
        maxAge - Period of validity
        secured - Is SSL
        返回:
        Return Response

      • cookie

        Response cookie(String path,
                String name,
                String value,
                int maxAge,
                boolean secured)
        Setting Cookie
        参数:
        path - Cookie Domain Path
        name - Cookie Name
        value - Cookie Value
        maxAge - Period of validity
        secured - Is SSL
        返回:
        Return Response

      • outputStream

        @Deprecated
OutputStreamWrapper outputStream()
                                      throws IOException
        已过时。 
        create temp file outputStream
        返回:
        return OutputStreamWrapper
        抛出:
        IOException - throw IOException
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0.1-alpha3

      • render

        default void render(String view)
        Render view, can be modified after WebHook
        参数:
        view - view page

      • render

        Render view And Setting Data, can be modified after WebHook
        参数:
        modelAndView - ModelAndView object

      • redirect

        Redirect to newUri
        参数:
        newUri - new url

      • modelAndView

        ModelAndView modelAndView()
        返回:
        Returns the currently set view, returning an empty Optional type when not set
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0.8
